titles: Admirable and notable prophesies vttered in former times by 24. famous Romain-Catholickes, concerning the Church of Rome's defection, tribulation, and reformation / written first in Latine, & now published in the English tongue, both by Iames Maxwell ...
author: Maxwell, James, b. 1581.
publisher: Printed by E.A. for W. Harper, and T. Harper, and are to be sold at their shop in S. Paules Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
